meanings.definition: Say or estimate that (a specified thing) will happen in the future or will be a consequence of something.
meanings.sent1: She predicts the weather by looking at the clouds.
meanings.sent2: The scientist predicts that the experiment will yield positive results.
meanings.sent3: The fortune teller predicts a sunny day for tomorrow's picnic.
meanings.sent4: His accurate predictions were like having a crystal ball.
meanings.sent5: The old farmer predicts rain by observing the behavior of animals.

meanings.definition: Foretell or prophesy what will happen.
meanings.sent1: The oracle predicts the fate of the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: Many cultures have prophets who predict future events.
meanings.sent3: The magic eight ball predicts a vacation in your future.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition predicts the outcome of the game before it even starts.
meanings.sent5: The ancient texts predict a great flood that will cleanse the land.
